name: Blocks Collapse Mania - Free Puzzle And Brain Game
name_original: Blocks Collapse Mania - Free Puzzle And Brain Game
description:
Blocks Collapse Mania is a new highscores block collapsing puzzle game with 2 addicting game modes - Challenge and Classic with 50 levels! Simple puzzle game to play, but difficult to master!

How to play Blocks Collapse Mania:

- Tap on a group of the same blocks to remove them!
- Classic - remove given number of blocks to progress to the next level! After you complete each level you can continue playing until there are possible moves! Less moves required to complete the levels = better score!
- Challenge - each group removed must contain at least a number of blocks above the board (target) to reset the board! Watch out the number is increasing! Get the best score possible!

Features:
- addicting puzzle game for the whole family
- 2 game modes - Classic with 50 levels and Challenge
- global leaderboards included
- in classic mode your progress is saved after each level, so you can continue playing later
- 100% free full version + no In-App purchases

If you find any bug or you have any suggestion please contact us, we will be happy to answer your question!

You can also join our facebook fan site at https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay

Thank you and have a nice time playing our puzzle game Blocks Collapse Mania!
